title: Sheraton Grand — Luxury hotels now grouped under new banner
text:
Sheraton Grand — Luxury hotels now grouped under new banner Friday August 21, 2015 Print Article 
100 Sheraton hotels will get the Sheraton Grand branding by 2017. — AFP pic NEW YORK, Aug 21 — Impeccable décor, fine dining, service that leaves nothing to be desired... the Sheraton brand has always boasted some of the most luxurious addresses belonging to Starwood Hotels & Resorts. Its parent company has decided to take this cream of the crop and brand it as Sheraton Grand. 
Though the announcement could appear to be just a new commercial strategy, it’s actually a significant development for tourists looking to make the most of a luxury holiday around the world. In this case, travelers will now direct themselves to the “Sheraton Grand” catalog to choose their stays. 
This new division guarantees tourists “an exemplary hotel offer.” Only establishments equipped with extraordinary gyms, spas that dreams are made of and rooms with “sophisticated design and precision workmanship,” and that are in specific locations “ranging from big cities to spectacular beaches,” can be a part of this network of addresses. They must also stand out in customer satisfaction. 
One hundred hotels are set to receive the “Sheraton Grand” label before 2017. The first to be so designated are the Bangalore Hotel — Brigade Gateway in India, the Beijing Dongcheng Hotel in China, the Sheraton Hotel Dubai, the Sheraton Hotel Edinburgh in Scotland, the Rio Hotel & Resort in Brazil, the Sheraton Grande Ocean Resort in Japan, the Sheraton Sukhumvit in Thailand, the Sheraton Taipei Hotel, the Tokyo Bay Hotel and the Sheraton Grande Walkerhill in South Korea. — AFP-Relaxnews
